special_powers.name: MORPH: CHANGING FREQUENCIES
special_powers.description: Give Spider-Man a move action or close combat action. After actions resolve, you may replace him with any other character with this trait or the Morph: Indentity Crisis trait on the same click number. If an opposing character took damage during that action, you may instead deal Spider-Man 1 unavoidable damage and then replace him with a character with the Morph: Spider Armor trait on the same click number.

special_powers.name: DOING THE THINGS A SPIDER CAN
special_powers.description: Spider-Man can use Leap/Climb and Super Senses.

special_powers.name: WHAT DID YOU EXPECT A STEALTH SUIT TO BE ABLE TO DO?
special_powers.description: Spider-Man can use Stealth. Any line of fire drawn to Spider-Man is blocked if he has no action tokens.

special_powers.name: MORPH: CHANGING FREQUENCIES
special_powers.description: Give Spider-Man a move action or close combat action. After actions resolve, you may replace him with any other character with this trait or the Morph: Indentity Crisis trait on the same click number. If an opposing character took damage during that action, you may instead deal Spider-Man 1 unavoidable damage and then replace him with a character with the Morph: Spider Armor trait on the same click number.

special_powers.name: DOING THE THINGS A SPIDER CAN
special_powers.description: Spider-Man can use Leap/Climb and Super Senses.

special_powers.name: HERE'S WEB IN YER EYE!
special_powers.description: When Spider-Man hits an opposing character, its range value becomes 0 and is locked until your next turn.

special_powers.name: MORPH: CHANGING FREQUENCIES
special_powers.description: Give Spider-Man a move action or close combat action. After actions resolve, you may replace him with any other character with this trait or the Morph: Indentity Crisis trait on the same click number. If an opposing character took damage during that action, you may instead deal Spider-Man 1 unavoidable damage and then replace him with a character with the Morph: Spider Armor trait on the same click number.

special_powers.name: DOING THE THINGS A SPIDER CAN
special_powers.description: Spider-Man can use Leap/Climb and Super Senses.

special_powers.name: ANTI-METAL SPIDER-TRACERS
special_powers.description: Give Spider-Man a power action. Choose a light or heavy object within range and line of fire, including a held object. Remove that object from the map.

special_powers.name: VIBRO SHOCK GAUNTLETS
special_powers.description: Shocker can use Penetrating/Psychic Blast. When he does and targets only one character, a hit character is also given an action token.

special_powers.name: LIGHT DAGGERS
special_powers.description: When Dagger hits a single target with a ranged combat attack, instead of dealing normal damage she may choose to deal 1 penetrating damage and heal herself or an adjacent friendly character of 1 damage.

special_powers.name: LIGHT OF HEALING
special_powers.description: Dagger can use Support. When she does, after actions resolve heal an adjacent friendly character named Cloak of 1 damage.

special_powers.name: SUPERNATURAL TRACKING
special_powers.description: At the beginning of the game, choose an opposing character. That character can't automatically break away from Blade and, when it does roll to break away, only succeeds on a result of 6.

special_powers.name: BLADE ISN'T JUST A NAME
special_powers.description: Blade can use Blades/Claws/Fangs. When he does, increase damage dealt by 1 for each of the following the target possesses or can use: Monster keyword, Mystical keyword, or Steal Energy.

special_powers.name: GATHER THEM: SECRET DEFENDERS OR MIDNIGHT SONS?
special_powers.description: At the beginning of the game, choose one: Dr. Strange and adjacent friendly characters can use the Defenders team ability; or Dr. Strange and adjacent friendly characters can use the Mystics team ability, but only to deal damage to adjacent opposing characters.

special_powers.name: THE SCENT OF BLOOD
special_powers.description: If an opposing character has taken damage this turn, modify Zuvembie's attack, speed, and damage values by +1.

special_powers.name: ZOMBIE PLAGUE
special_powers.description: When Zuvembie KO's an opposing character with an attack, you may place a ASM #006 Zuvembie in its square and add it to your force.

special_powers.name: THE BLOOD OF INNOCENTS
special_powers.description: When an opposing character within Johnny Blaze's line of fire KO's another friendly character, you may remove all action tokens from Johnny Blaze and replace him with ASM #046 Ghost Rider on its orange starting line.

special_powers.name: ALTER EGO: GHOST RIDER
special_powers.description: Give Johnny Blaze a power action that deals no pushing damage and replace this character with ASM #046 Ghost Rider on its orange starting line. This power can't be countered.

special_powers.name: HELFIRE SHOTGUN
special_powers.description: When Johnny Blaze makes a ranged combat attack against a single character, you may replace his damage value with 4 minus the number of squares to the target and lock it. If the target has two action tokens, the damage from the attack is penetrating damage.

special_powers.name: CALL ME... DRUID
special_powers.description: Dr. Druid can use Pulse Wave. When Dr. Druid is given a non-free action, before the action you may place him in a square of hindering terrain within 6 squares and line of fire.

special_powers.name: EXORCIST SUPREME
special_powers.description: Daimon Hellstrom and adjacent friendly characters can't be the target of Mind Control.

special_powers.name: CHOKE
special_powers.description: When Frankenstein's Monster hits a single opposing character with a close combat attack, that character can't be moved or placed until your next turn.

special_powers.name: SHAMBLING ALONG
special_powers.description: At the beginning of your turn, Living Mummy may be placed into an adjacent square.

special_powers.name: ORB OF RA
special_powers.description: Living Mummy can use Mind Control as if had a range of 8 and 2 targets.  When he does, modify his attack value by +2.

special_powers.name: VAMPIRIC HUNGER
special_powers.description: Vampire begins the game on click #2.  Vampire can use Steal Energy and may use it to heal beyond his starting line, up to click #1.

special_powers.name: THE SCENT OF BLOOD
special_powers.description: If an opposing character has taken damage this turn, modify Vampire's attack, speed, and damage values by +1.

special_powers.name: VAMPIRE HUNTER
special_powers.description: Frank Drake can use Outwit.  Once per turn, when he uses it to target a character with the Monster or Mystical keyword, he may use it again targeting the same character.

special_powers.name: FORM OF MIST, FORM OF WOLF
special_powers.description: Hannibal King can use Running Shot and Stealth.  At the beginning of your turn you may choose to increase Hannibal King's attack or defense value by 1 or 2; if you do, then decrease the other combat value by the same amount until your next turn.

special_powers.name: FULL MOON
special_powers.description: At the beginning of your turn, roll a d6 once for all friendly characters with the Full Moon trait. On a result of 1-3, Werewolf can use Shape Change. On a result of 4-6, click Werewolf to click #11 and click him to click #2 at the end of the turn or before he takes any damage, whichever comes first.

special_powers.name: THE SCENT OF BLOOD
special_powers.description: If an opposing character has taken damage this turn, modify Werewolf's attack, speed, and damage values by +1.

special_powers.name: FULL MOON
special_powers.description: At the beginning of your turn, roll a d6 once for all friendly characters with Full Moon trait. On a result of 1-3, Werewolf By Night can use Shape Change. On a result of 4-6, click Werewolf By Night to either click #9 or click #11 and click him to click #3 at the end of the turn or before he takes any damage, whichever comes first.

special_powers.name: CURSE OF THE WEREWOLF
special_powers.description: When an opposing character takes damage from Werewolf By Night's attack, that character possesses Battle Fury as long as Werewolf By Night is on the map.

special_powers.name: VAMPIRIC HUNGER
special_powers.description: Dracula begins the game on click #4.  Dracula can use Steal Energy and may use it to heal beyond his starting line, up to click #1.

special_powers.name: HYPNOTIZE MY VICTIMS
special_powers.description: Dracula can use Stealth. When an opposing character takes damage from Dracula's attack, mark that character with a Mesmerize token.  Dracula can use Mind Control with 2 targets, but only to target characters with a Mesmerize token or characters with the Animal or Monster keyword.  Dracula takes a maximum of 1 damage from using Mind Control in this way.

special_powers.name: MISTFORM
special_powers.description: Dracula can use Regeneration as a free action. Give Dracula a free action and choose Combat Reflexes or Energy Shield/ Deflection. Dracula can use the chosen power until your next turn, even if this power is lost.

special_powers.name: NULL OF LEGBA'S STAFF
special_powers.description: Dr. Voodoo can use Penetrating/Psychic Blast. When he uses it and hits a character of 100 points or more, all damage dealt to that character this turn is penetrating damage.

special_powers.name: THE REGULAR KIND OF DOCTOR TOO
special_powers.description: Dr. Voodoo can use Perplex and Support.

special_powers.name: MY SPIRIT BROTHER POSSESSES YOU
special_powers.description: When Brother Voodoo has exactly one action token, he can use Mind Control as a free action. He takes no damage from this use of Mind Control and he and his target modify their attack values by +1 this turn.

special_powers.name: FIRE AND SMOKE
special_powers.description: Brother Voodoo can use Poison and Smoke Cloud. If there's an opposing character adjacent to him, he may use Smoke Cloud as a free action instead.

special_powers.name: LEDGE DANGLE: SPILL YOUR GUTS OR TAKE THE FALL?
special_powers.description: When Scarlet Spider occupies the rim of elevated terrain and hits an opposing character with a close combat attack, after actions resolve, that character's controller chooses one: that character can't use any powers or abilities until your next turn; or that character rolls a d6 and on a result of 1-3 deal that character 2 unavoidable damage, 4-6 deal that character 1 unavoidable damage.

special_powers.name: HOUSTON'S PROTECTOR
special_powers.description: Scarlet Spider can use Charge, Flurry and Improved Movement: Elevated, Hindering.

special_powers.name: SPARE STEALTH SUIT
special_powers.description: Scarlet Spider can use Stealth.

special_powers.name: I'M NOT JUST YOUR SERVICE TAXI, OCTAVIUS
special_powers.description: When Vulture uses the Carry ability, he may carry two characters if they both possess the Sinister Syndicate keyword or team ability.

special_powers.name: MASTER AERIALIST
special_powers.description: Vulture can use Energy Shield/Deflection. Vulture can use Combat Reflexes but does not modify his defense value when the attacker can use Leap/Climb or the Flight ability.

special_powers.name: HEAD DOWN, HORN UP
special_powers.description: Rhino can use Charge. When he does, he automatically breaks away and if he moves in a direct line and hits a character along that path, roll a d6; increase Rhino's damage value by half the result.

special_powers.name: TRAVEL THROUGH THE WIRES
special_powers.description: Give Electro a power action. Place him in the same square as any unheld object on the map.

special_powers.name: ARC LIGHTNING
special_powers.description: Give Electro a power action and make a ranged combat attack against a single target using his printed damage value. Each time he hits, after actions resolve, he may then make a ranged combat attack as a free action against another single target as if he occupied the previously hit character's square, replacing his range value with his printed range value minus the number of hits he has made this turn with this power.

special_powers.name: DARK FORM
special_powers.description: Cloak and adjacent characters named Dagger can use Stealth. Cloak can use the Carry ability.

special_powers.name: EXILED TO THE DARKFORCE DIMENSION
special_powers.description: Cloak can use Incapacitate. When he does, he may give a hit character two action tokens instead of one. If you do, deal Cloak 1 unavoidable damage after actions resolve.

special_powers.name: MASTER AND SERVANT
special_powers.description: When Wong is adjacent to a friendly character named Dr. Strange, modify Wong's attack value by +1 and Dr. Strange's defense value by +1 if not already modified by this effect.

special_powers.name: BACKUP SPELLCASTER
special_powers.description: If a friendly character with the Mystical keyword is within 4 squares and line of fire and can use Perplex or Probability Control you may give Wong a power action to use that power until your next turn.

special_powers.name: MORPH: SPIDER ARMOR
special_powers.description: Give Spider-Man a move action or close combat action. After actions resolve, you may replace him with any other character with this trait, the Morph: Identity Crisis trait, or the Morph: Changing Frequencies trait on the same click number.

special_powers.name: SPIDER-TRACERS
special_powers.description: Spider-Man can use Incapacitate as if he has a range value of 6. When he does and hits, mark the hit character. Lines of fires drawn to marked characters by friendly characters are blocked only by walls and indoor blocking terrain as long as Spider-Man is on the map.

special_powers.name: THE AGILITY OF A SPIDER
special_powers.description: Spider-Man can use Hypersonic Speed, but modifies his speed value by -3 when he does.

special_powers.name: CREATURE FROM THE DEEP
special_powers.description: If Manphibian begins the turn occupying water terrain, modify his speed and attack values by +2.

special_powers.name: AH, BUT WHICH ONE AM I?
special_powers.description: The first copy of Mysterio on your force costs 70 points and begins the game on the click #1 that appears after two consecutive (red) KO clicks.  Additional copies of this character on your force cost 15 points each and begin the game on the click #1 that appears after the (orange) KO.  Mysterio is considered 70 points for all game effects except victory points.

special_powers.name: SMOKE AND MIRRORS
special_powers.description: Mysterio can use Incapacitate and Smoke Cloud.  When he uses Smoke Cloud, after actions resolve you may place this character and any other ASM #026 Mysterio in each other's squares.

special_powers.name: HOLOGRAMS AND HALLUCINOGENS
special_powers.description: If no other friendly character named Mysterio has used Outwit this turn, Mysterio can use Outwit.

special_powers.name: RESCUE THE INJURED
special_powers.description: Spider-Girl can use the Carry ability, but only to carry a friendly character that's adjacent to an opposing character.  When she does, after actions resolve, heal the carried character of 1 damage if it's adjacent to no opposing characters.

special_powers.name: VAMPIRIC HUNGER
special_powers.description: Mobius begins the game on click #3.  Morbius can use Steal Energy and may use it to heal beyond his starting line, up to click #1.

special_powers.name: NO VAMPIRIC WEAKNESSES
special_powers.description: Characters can't target Morbius with Exploit Weakness.

special_powers.name: ANTIBODY SERUM CREATOR
special_powers.description: Morbius can use Outwit.  When he uses Outwit to counter a power that isn't a defense power, counter that same power on each other opposing character within 10 squares and line of fire.

special_powers.name: BLACK PUMPKIN BOMBS OF FEAR
special_powers.description: Demogoblin can use Energy Explosion. When he does, hit characters modify their defense value by -1 until your next turn.

special_powers.name: REPENT!
special_powers.description: When Demogoblin hits an opposing character and actions resolve, that character's controller chooses one: give that character two action tokens; or that character's defense powers are countered until your next turn.

special_powers.name: REGENERATIVE PROPERTIES OF LIZARDS
special_powers.description: Lizard can use Regeneration and Toughness. He can use Regeneration as a free action if he took 2 or more damage since your last turn from a single attack.

special_powers.name: TAIL ATTACK
special_powers.description: Give Lizard a free action to make a close combat attack modifying his attack value by -1.

special_powers.name: LAST HUNT
special_powers.description: At the beginning of the game, choose an opposing character. Kraven the Hunter modifies his attack value by +1 when targeting that character with an attack. When the chosen character is KO'd by Kraven the Hunter's attack, modify Kraven the Hunter's combat values by +1 and choose a standard power that character possessed on any click. Kraven the Hunter can use that power for the rest of the game.

special_powers.name: STALKING HIS PREY
special_powers.description: Kraven the Hunter can use Leap/Climb and Stealth.

special_powers.name: JUNGLE POTIONS
special_powers.description: Kraven the Hunter can use Combat Reflexes, Super Senses, and Toughness.

special_powers.name: GULYADKIN
special_powers.description: As you place your force on the map, you may place in your starting area a Gulyadkin the Lion bystander token as described on the back of this card. As long as a friendly Alyosha Kraven is on the map, Gulyadkin the Lion can be given one action as a free action.

special_powers.name: ANIMAL INFLUENCE
special_powers.description: If Alyosha Kraven was given a non-free action this turn, you may give Gulyadkin the Lion or another friendly character with the Animal keyword a move action as a free action.

special_powers.name: FULL MOON
special_powers.description: At the beginning of the turn, roll a d6 once for all friendly characters with the Full Moon trait. On a result of 1-3, Moon Knight can use Stealth. On a result of 4-6, modify Moon Knight's combat values by +1 until your next turn.

special_powers.name: LISTEN TO MY SPIDER-MAN, WOLVERINE, ECHO, OR CAPTAIN AMERICA?
special_powers.description: Give Moon-Knight a free action and choose one to last until your next turn: * Modify his speed value by +1 and he can use Flurry. * Modify his attack value by +1 and he can use Blades/Claws/Fangs. * Modify his defense value by +1 and he can use Willpower. * Modify his damage value by +1 and he can use Leadership.

special_powers.name: T-BOLT'S CHOSEN TRANSPORT
special_powers.description: Man-Thing can use Phasing/Teleport. Man-Thing can use the Carry ability and when he does, he may carry two characters with the Mystical or Thunderbolts keyword and his speed value is not modified by it.

special_powers.name: WHATEVER KNOWS FEAR...
special_powers.description: Man-Thing can use Poison. When he does, instead of dealing normal damage, roll a d6 that can't be rerolled for each adjacent opposing character. On a result of 1-3 deal that character 1 damage. On a result of 4-5, deal that character 2 damage. On a result of 6, deal that character 3 damage.

special_powers.name: SOUL COLLECTOR
special_powers.description: Satana Hellstrom can use Steal Energy. If she's on click #1 when a character takes damage from her close combat attack, place an Excess Soul token on this card. Give Satana Hellstrom a free action, and remove an Excess Soul token to modify her combat values by +1 until your next turn.

special_powers.name: SOUL SHRIVEL
special_powers.description: Characters that are hit by Satana Hellstrom modify their combat values by -1 until your next turn.

special_powers.name: DEFENDER OF THE NEXUS OF REALITIES
special_powers.description: At the beginning of the game, place a special Nexus terrain marker on the map, at least 5 squares away from any starting area. A character occupying that square can use Probability Control, even if Jennifer Kale isn't on the map. If Jennifer Kale occupies that square, she can use it in addition to her normal Probability Control.

special_powers.name: NEXUS DUO
special_powers.description: When a friendly character named Man-Thing is adjacent to Jennifer Kale, they both modify their attack values by +1 if not already modified by this effect.

special_powers.name: ALTER EGO: BUT I'VE BECOME A HERO
special_powers.description: Give Kaine a power action that deals no pushing damage and replace this character with ASM #018 Scarlet Spider on its orange starting line. This power can't be countered.

special_powers.name: THE STRONGEST PARKER
special_powers.description: When Kaine is hit by an attack, roll a d6 before damage is dealt. On a result of 1-2, he can use Toughness. 3-4, he can use Invulnerability. 5-6, he evades the attack.

special_powers.name: SPIDER SENSE PRECOGNITION
special_powers.description: Kaine can use Probability Control, but only during your turn.

special_powers.name: YOU ARE NOW THE SORCERER SUPREME
special_powers.description: Ancient One can use Enhancement. When Ancient One is KO'd, choose a friendly character with the Mystical keyword that's 150 points or less. That character modifies their combat values by +1 this game.

special_powers.name: MENTOR TO MANY MAGICIANS
special_powers.description: Ancient One can use Leadership. When he does and succeeds, in addition to the normal effects, he may remove an action token from an adjacent friendly character with the Mystical keyword that is 150 points or less.

special_powers.name: THE ORIGINAL SORCERER SUPREME
special_powers.description: Once during your opponent's turn, Ancient One may force that opponent to reroll any die roll, ignoring the original roll.

special_powers.name: RED DUST OF DEATH
special_powers.description: Carrion can use Poison. When he does, adjacent opposing characters less than 100 points are dealt 2 damage instead of 1, and adjacent opposing characters of 100 or more points are also given an action token.

special_powers.name: INTANGIBLE
special_powers.description: Carrion can use Toughness and Super Senses. When he uses Super Senses, he evades the attack on a result of 4-6.

special_powers.name: ROTTING TOUCH
special_powers.description: Carrion can use Exploit Weakness. When he does and hits, until your next turn the hit character can't use defense powers except Super Senses.

special_powers.name: SPIDER-CAMOUFLAGE
special_powers.description: Spider-Man can use Stealth. When it's not your turn, lines of fire can't be drawn to Spider-Man if he's adjacent to blocking terrain.

special_powers.name: DARK THUNDER
special_powers.description: Blackheart begins the game with one Red Gargoyle and one Blue Gargoyle attached.  Give Blackheart a power action and remove a Gargoyle from Blackheart and place it in an adjacent square. The chosen Gargoyle becomes a bystander token as described on the back of this card. When a Gargoyle is KO'd, reattach it to Blackheart.

special_powers.name: SOUL CORRUPT
special_powers.description: Give Blackheart a close or ranged combat action, modify his damage value by -2 and, if he hits a character, place a Corruptor token on this card.  As a free action remove a Corruptor token and choose an opposing character. All damage dealt to that character this turn is penetrating.

special_powers.name: TELEKINESIS
special_powers.description: Red Gargoyle can use Telekinesis, but only to place friendly characters named Blackheart or Blue Gargoyle regardless of their base size.

special_powers.name: I'M A CRIMINAL MASTERMIND, NOT A LUNATIC
special_powers.description: Hobgoblin can use Leadership and Mastermind.

special_powers.name: FRAME YOU AS THE HOBGOBLIN
special_powers.description: Hobgoblin can use Mind Control. When he is adjacent to an opposing character, he can use Shape Change.

special_powers.name: RANDOMIZED FINGER BLASTS
special_powers.description: Hobgoblin has "3 targets" and when he makes a ranged combat attack, his targets can't use Super Senses. If he targets more than one character with an attack, modify his attack value by -1.

special_powers.name: SONIC SCREAM
special_powers.description: Hobgoblin can use Pulse Wave. When he uses Pulse Wave and has no action tokens, each hit character also recieves an action token.

special_powers.name: LUNATIC LAUGH
special_powers.description: Hobgoblin can use Incapacitate. When he does and hits an adjacent character, after actions resolve, he may be given a close combat action as a free action.

special_powers.name: MY NIGHTMARE - OR YOURS?
special_powers.description: If an opponent wins the roll to determine the first player and does not choose Nightmare's controller to be the first player, characters on that opponent's force modify their attack value by -1 as long as Nightmare is on the map.

special_powers.name: FEED ON YOUR FEAR AND DESPAIR
special_powers.description: Once per turn, when an opposing character takes pushing damage, you may heal Nightmare 1 click.

special_powers.name: YOUR MIND BETRAYS YOU
special_powers.description: Nightmare can use Penetrating/Psychic Blast. When he does, modify his attack value by +1 for each action token on all target characters.

special_powers.name: THE FORBIDDEN NAMES DEMAND A BLOOD SACRIFICE
special_powers.description: Give Baron Mordo a free action and chose a standard power other than a defense power. Baron Mordo can use the chosen power until your next turn. If you do and no opposing character was hit by Baron Mordo, at the end of the turn deal Baron Mordo 1 unavoidable damage.

special_powers.name: ANCIENT ONE'S BEST PUPIL
special_powers.description: Baron Mordo can use Probability Control. If he has one action token, he can use either Outwit or Perplex until your next turn.

special_powers.name: DAUGHTERS OF THE DRAGON
special_powers.description: When you build your force, choose a 70 or 140 point cost. In addition, each time you reveal your force, choose the green (Colleen Wing) or yellow (Misty Knight) starting line. If you chose 70 point cost, this character has the "single fist symbol" and is KO'd when the first red line is crossed. If you chose 140 point cost, this character is KO'd when the third red line is crossed.

special_powers.name: STARK'S FREEZE RAY
special_powers.description: Colleen Wing and Misty Knight has a range value of 5 and can use Incapacitate and the Police team ability.

special_powers.name: HEROES FOR HIRE
special_powers.description: Colleen Wing and Misty Knight can use Leadership. Give Colleen Wing and Misty Knight a power action and remove an action token from an adjacent friendly character with the Heroes for Hire keyword.

special_powers.name: MASTER OF ROCK AND STONE
special_powers.description: Terrax and friendly characters can use Improved Movement: Elevated.

special_powers.name: MAJOR EARTHQUAKE
special_powers.description: Give Terrax a power action and make a ranged combat attack targeting all characters occupying or adjacent to a square within his range and line of fire. A hit character occupying that square is dealt 4 damage, and each hit character adjacent to that square is dealt 3 damage.

special_powers.name: STONE GIVES ME STRENGTH
special_powers.description: Modify Terrax's damage value by the number of squares of blocking terrain adjacent to him.

special_powers.name: LIVING HELLFIRE CHAIN
special_powers.description: If Ghost Rider has two action tokens you may give him a free action and deal 1 penetrating damage to a single opposing character within 3 squares.

special_powers.name: PENANCE STARE
special_powers.description: Ghost Rider deals penetrating damage to opposing characters that have damaged a friendly character since your last turn.

special_powers.name: TRAPPED IN A WORLD THEY NEVER MADE
special_powers.description: Man-Thing and Howard the Duck can use Perplex.

special_powers.name: SAVE THE UNIVERSE, AND EVERYONE STILL IGNORES ME
special_powers.description: Man-Thing and Howard the Duck can't be targeted by nonadjacent opposing characters.

special_powers.name: WAAAUGH! NO ONE UNDERSTANDS US...
special_powers.description: Man-Thing and Howard the Duck's combat values can't be modified by other characters.

special_powers.name: CRYPTIC CHOICES
special_powers.description: As you reveal your force, roll a d6 that can't be rerolled. 1 - Begin at the green starting line. 2 - begin at the red starting line. 3 - Begin at the blue starting line. 4 - Begin at the yellow starting line. 5-6 - Begin at the starting line of your choice.

special_powers.name: CLAIRVOYANCE
special_powers.description: Madame Web can use Super Senses. Once per game, give Madame Web a power action and place her within 4 squares and line of fire of any friendly character.

special_powers.name: HEED MY WORDS
special_powers.description: Before a friendly character within 4 squares and line of fire makes an attack roll, you may choose a number from 2-5. If the chosen number comes up on either die, increase the attack total by 1. If it comes up on both dice, increase the attack total by 3.

special_powers.name: MANIFEST DESTINY, 3099 AND BEYOND
special_powers.description: If Spider-Man 2099 is 80 points, he is KO'd if he crosses the red KO line. If Spider-Man 2099 is 160 points, he is not KO'd when he crosses the red KO line.

special_powers.name: HUMANITY'S ULTIMATE
special_powers.description: Spider-Man 2099 possesses the Power Cosmic team ability and a range value of 8.

special_powers.name: WORTHY TO WIELD MJOLNIR
special_powers.description: When turning the dial, if this click is revealed due to damage taken from an opponent's attack, stop turning the dial.

special_powers.name: MORPH: IDENTITY CRISIS
special_powers.description: Give Hornet a move action or ranged combat action. After actions resolve, you may replace him with any other character with this trait on the same click number. If an opposing character took damage during that action, you may instead deal Ricochet 1 unavoidable damage and then replace him with a character with the Morph: Changing Frequencies trait on the same click number.

special_powers.name: SEDATIVE STINGERS
special_powers.description: If an opposing character's printed defense value is lower than Hornet's printed defense value after that character takes damage from Hornet's ranged combat attack, give that character an action token.

special_powers.name: CYBERNETIC CARAPACE
special_powers.description: Hornet can use Toughness and Super Senses.

special_powers.name: GADGETY DEFENDER
special_powers.description: Hornet can use Perplex. Once per turn when he uses Perplex, roll a d6. On a roll of 5-6, he may use Perplex again.

special_powers.name: MORPH: IDENTITY CRISIS
special_powers.description: Give Ricochet a move action or ranged combat action. After actions resolve, you may replace him with any other character with this trait on the same click number. If an opposing character took damage during that action, you may instead deal Ricochet 1 unavoidable damage and then replace him with a character with the Morph: Changing Frequencies trait on the same click number.

special_powers.name: RICOCHET DISCS
special_powers.description: When Ricochet draws a line of fire for a ranged combat attack, you may choose an unoccupied square of clear terrain that is adjacent to blocking terrain within range and line of fire and then draw your line of fire and count your range as if Ricochet occupied the chosen square.

special_powers.name: AGILE ACROBAT
special_powers.description: Ricochet can use Combat Reflexes and Super Senses.

special_powers.name: SMOOTH TALKING CRIMINAL
special_powers.description: Ricochet can use Outwit. Once per turn when he uses Outwit, roll a d6. On a roll of 5-6, he may use Outwit again.

special_powers.name: MORPH: IDENTITY CRISIS
special_powers.description: Give Dusk a move action or a ranged combat action. After actions resolve, you may replace him with any other character with this trait on the same clix number. If an opposing character took damage during that action, you may instead deal Dusk 1 unavoidable damage and then replace him with a character with the Morph: Changing Frequencies trait on the same clix number.

special_powers.name: SHADOWMELD
special_powers.description: When Dusk occupies a square of hindering terrain, give him a free action and place him in another square of hindering terrain within 6 squares and line of fire. After actions resolve, a friendly character of equal or lesser points that was adjacent to Dusk when given the free action may be placed adjacent to Dusk but can't be given an action until your next turn.

special_powers.name: STEALTHY STALKER
special_powers.description: Dusk can use Regeneration, Stealth and Super Senses.

special_powers.name: MORPH: IDENTITY CRISIS
special_powers.description: Give Prodigy a move action or a ranged combat action. After actions resolve, you may replace him with any other character with this trait on the same clix number. If an opposing character took damage during that action, you may instead deal Prodigy 1 unavoidable damage and then replace him whit a character with the Morph: Changing Frequencies trait on the same clix number.

special_powers.name: GLIMMERING GUARDIAN
special_powers.description: Modify the defense value of adjacent friendly characters by +1 if they are equal to or less than Prodigy's point value and have not already been modified by this effect.

special_powers.name: IRON IDOL
special_powers.description: Prodigy can use Invulnerability and Super Senses.

special_powers.name: MORPH: SPIDER ARMOR
special_powers.description: Give Spider-Man a move action or close combat action. After actions resolve, you may replace him with any other character with this trait, the Morph: Identity Crisis trait, or the Morph: Changing Frequencies trait on the same click number.

special_powers.name: SHINY ARMOR
special_powers.description: Spider-Man can use Energy Shield/Deflection.

special_powers.name: I FIGHT BEST WHEN I'M OUTNUMBERED
special_powers.description: If no friendly characters and at least 2 opposing characters are within 3 squares of Spider-Man, modify Spider-Man's combat values by +1.

special_powers.name: MORPH: SPIDER ARMOR
special_powers.description: Give Spider-Man a move action or close combat action. After actions resolve, you may replace him with any other character with this trait, the Morph: Identity Crisis trait, or the Morph: Changing Frequencies trait on the same click number.

special_powers.name: MAGNETIC WEBBING
special_powers.description: Spider-Man can use Incapacitate. When he does, hit characters using Impervious or Invulnerability use Toughness instead this turn.

special_powers.name: BULLETPROOF POLYMER
special_powers.description: Spider-Man can use Energy Shield/Deflection and Invulnerability.

special_powers.name: MORPH: SPIDER ARMOR
special_powers.description: Give Iron Spider a move action or close combat action. After actions resolve, you may replace him with any other character with this trait, the Morph: Identity Crisis trait, or the Morph: Changing Frequencies trait on the same click number.

special_powers.name: GLIDING TO THE RESCUE
special_powers.description: Iron Spider can use the Flight ability and Running Shot.

special_powers.name: THREE "WALDOS"
special_powers.description: Once per turn, Iron Spider can use Flurry or Perplex, and can only use Perplex to target himself.

special_powers.name: MORPH: SPIDER ARMOR
special_powers.description: Give Spider-Man a move action or close combat action. After actions resolve, you may replace him with any other character with this trait, the Morph: Identity Crisis trait, or the Morph: Changing Frequencies trait on the same click number.

special_powers.name: ANTI-SINISTER SIX
special_powers.description: Spider-Man ignores Plasticity and Shape Change and can't be targeted with Outwit, Penetrating/Psychic Blast, and Perplex. Spider-Man ignores damage dealt by characters who are given an action to use Charge this turn. This trait only applies to characters less than Spider-Man's point value or possessing the Sinister Syndicate keyword or team ability.

special_powers.name: WHERE'S MY SYNAPTIC-GLUE PILLS?
special_powers.description: When Franken-Castle has two action tokens, modify his defense value by -1.

special_powers.name: DRILL-DRONE GUN
special_powers.description: When Franken-Castle hits a character with a ranged combat attack, you may choose to deal no damage and mark that character. Even if this power is countered or lost, at the beginning of each of your turns deal 1 penetrating damage to each character marked in this way. Marked characters in this way may be given a double power action to remove the mark.

special_powers.name: WE NEED A TACTICIAN TO DEFEND MONSTERS
special_powers.description: Franken-Castle can use Enhancement and Leadership. If he uses Leadership to remove an action token from a character with the Monster keyword, he may also remove an action token from himself.

special_powers.name: AMULET OF DAMBALLAH
special_powers.description: At the beginning of the game, place an Amulet of Damballah relic token in a clear square as close to the center of the map as possible. This object does not count towards your force and is decribed on the back of the card.  AMULET OF DAMBALLAH Immobile (Blue) Relic 3-6  If another character friendly to The Zombie has this token on its card, The Zombie may be given one action as a free action each turn. If a character opposing to The Zombie has this token on its card, it can use Mind Control, but only to target The Zombie.

If another character friendly to The Zombie has this token on its card, The Zombie may be given one action as a free action each turn. If a character opposing to The Zombie has this token on its card, it can use Mind Control, but only to target The Zombie.

special_powers.name: MORPH: IDENTITY CRISIS
special_powers.description: Give Spider-Man a move action or ranged combat action. After actions resolve, you may replace him with any other character with this trait on the same click number. If an opposing character took damage during that action, you may instead deal Spider-Man 1 unavoidable damage and replace him with a character with the Morph: Changing Frequencies trait on the same click.

special_powers.name: WEB IN THE EYES
special_powers.description: When Spider-Man hits with a ranged combat attack, hit characters modify their attack value by -3 until your next turn.

special_powers.name: THROUGH THE DARK DIMENSION
special_powers.description: Cloak may carry any number of adjacent friendly characters. After an action resolves in which Cloak carries more than one character, deal him damage equal to the number of characters he carried minus one.

special_powers.name: ENVELOP IN DARKNESS
special_powers.description: Cloak can use Exploit Weakness. When he does, hit characters are given an action token.

special_powers.name: DAGGERS OF LIGHT
special_powers.description: Give Dagger a ranged combat action. Dagger has [sharpshooter] and hit characters are each dealt 1 penetrating damage instead of normal damage.

special_powers.name: RHINO CHARGE
special_powers.description: Rhino can use Charge and breaks away automatically when doing so. When he does, if he moves in a direct line, he can use Improved Movement: Hindering, Destroy Blocking, may only target a character along that path, and modifies his damage value by +1 for each square moved.

special_powers.name: SHORT CIRCUIT
special_powers.description: Electro can use Energy Explosion, Poison, and Pulse Wave.

special_powers.name: DANGEROUS TO THE TOUCH
special_powers.description: When Electro is hit with a close combat attack, the attacker is dealt 1 penetrating damage after the attack resolves.

special_powers.name: FOOL! THAT WAS JUST ONE OF MY ILLUSIONS
special_powers.description: Mysterio can use Super Senses and evades the attack on a roll of a 4-6. When he uses Super Senses to evade an attack, you may place him in any square within 3 squares and line of fire.

special_powers.name: DISORIENTING ILLUSIONS
special_powers.description: Mysterio can use Perplex. He can use it normally or he can modify both the attack and defense values of an opposing character by -1 each.

special_powers.name: VIBRATION SUIT
special_powers.description: Shocker can use Toughness and breaks away automatically.

special_powers.name: DIRECTIONAL VIBRATION
special_powers.description: Give Shocker a power action. Draw a straight horizontal or vertical line of fire to any single square within Shocker's range and line of fire, ignoring other characters for line of fire purposes. Make a ranged combat attack that does not target, even if Shocker is adjacent to an opposing character. Compare the result to each other character occupying a square along that line of fire, or a square adjacent to that line of fire but still within his range. Each hit character on the line is dealt 3 damage, each hit character adjacent to that line is dealt 1 damage.

special_powers.name: STEALTH SUIT
special_powers.description: Lines of fire for an attack can't be drawn to Scarlet Spider if he is adjacent to a wall or blocking terrain.

special_powers.name: MARK OF KAINE
special_powers.description: When Scarlet Spider hits a character with a close combat attack, after actions resolve, deal the character 1 penetrating damage.

special_powers.name: I'M TEXTING EVERYONE
special_powers.description: Give Spider-Girl a free action and choose a character within range.  This turn, all lines of fire drawn to that character ignore hindering terrain.

Characters that are attacked by a character with the Eye of Agamotto on its card can't use Shape Change and Super Senses for that attack. A character with the Eye of Agamotto on its card can use Probability Control when it attacks. If a character with the Eye of Agamotto on its card has the Mystical keyword, it can use Perplex.
A character with Dr. Octopus Arms on its character card has a minimum range value of 4, has 3 targets and can use Perplex twice during your turn, but only to target itself.
